title: Reworked, but her terror lives on.

replies.body:
Fun fact: Look at the bottom right corner of Candy King Ivern's splash art.

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/003/559/928/large/christian-fell-ivern-kingcandy-final.jpg?1475006406

Lollipoppy's new splash has it too.
http://www.lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Lollipoppy-Splash-Art-Update-HD-4k-Wallpaper-Background-Official-Art-Artwork-League-of-Legends-lol-1024x604.jpg

OH MY GOD NO
*Her terror lives on*
_**shes always watching**_

######i wish I could get lumberjack lollipopsion or what I'm assuming is reksai lollipoppy link to work but reddit on phone don't work.

see this is THE GOOD OLD RIOT games who knew this face was nightmare fuel, yet they kept it in 2 splash arts as easteregg/friendly wink to oldschool players.
